snippet: At Eleven Madison Park, the chef Daniel Humm and general manager Will Guidara believe a restaurant should take risks in the quest for “endless reinvention.”
abstract: Eleven Madison Park is preparing to reveal its reinvention, incorporating flourishes that are undoubtedly attention-getting and arguably risky; among the changes will be a roaming cocktail cart serving neighborhood-specific variations on the manhattan at tableside, meatless carrot tartare and a dessert course that hinges on a card trick.
lead_paragraph: At Eleven Madison Park, the chef Daniel Humm and general manager Will Guidara believe a restaurant should take risks in the quest for “endless reinvention.”

headline.seo: At Eleven Madison Park, a Reinvention
headline.main: Reinvention, With Card Tricks and a Drink Cart
headline.print_headline: Reinvention, With Card Tricks And a Drink Cart
